channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CAMEL-20438] camel-xslt - XPath evaluation fails in Java DSL routes
item.description:
The following route fails to evaluate the xpath:

from("direct:hello")
        .routeId("xpath-route")
        .setBody(xpath("//hello/id", Integer.class))
        .to("direct:goodbye");

There seems to be an issue with the instance of QName used. I think it should be XPathConstants.NODESET but instead it is a custom instance with nulled namespace field.

Full project example: https://github.com/alex-nt/issues-java/tree/main/camel/camel-xpath
Running mvn clean install in the module should reproduce the issue.

Error

item.summary: camel-xslt - XPath evaluation fails in Java DSL routes

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Here is how you can do it in 4.4.0

XPathExpression xp = new XPathExpression("//hello/id");
xp.setResultQName("NUMBER");
xp.setResultType(Integer.class);

from("direct:hello")
.routeId("xpath-route")
.setBody(xp)
.to("seda:goodbye");
Thanks a lot for the fix and the workaround
